alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Clarke; Mobile Inland; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:53PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mobile, northwestern Baldwin, southeastern Washington and southern Clarke Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 752 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Calvert, or 18 miles north of Bay Minette, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stockton, Axis, Mount Vernon, Calvert, Movico and I65 And AL 225. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Inland; Clarke; Mobile Inland; Washington
